posts.text: Dear colleaguesI have three sibling- patients with hyperphosphatasia. What is interesting about them that they are all girls. Is there anybody who is  interested in looking genes for these patients. thanksBehzat OzkanAssoc. Prof of Pediatric EndocrinologyAtaturk UniversityErzurum, Turkeybozkan@...behzatozkan@...
this is a test of the new mailing list.we have 88 members now, and counting.-dennis brenner

Thanks.  Let's hope all goes well. Only to test the new peds-endo list

title: Getting rid of the ads on the list.

posts.text: It will cost us $60 per year to get rid of the ads on the list.I figure there are 2 ways to do this:1. Having one of the corporate representatives on the list get their company to donate the $60 (of course that would not give them any control over the list or anything like that). or2. maybe 6 people will contribute $10 each?? I will pony up the first $10 if we go that route.In either case, if anyone is interested in helping out with this,email me PRIVATELY at db999@... (do not post it to the whole list).Thanks-Dennis Brenner, M.D.
